name: Tools of War
description:
you were built for a purpose, 

you were built to be used,

you were built for blood, whether you liked it or not,

and this war will ensure you do what you were built for

Tools of War is a solo journaling game where you play as a object of strength or political power as it is used throughout a war. You are passed from holder to holder as the war you are in consumes the people around you. Unable to make choices for yourself, your holders and their choices are the only way you can interact with the world. 

There are multiple playbooks to chose from, each with unique prompts and story potential. Play as a sword, a dagger, a shield, a wand or a crown. 

Content warning: This game takes place over the course of a war. Due to this, it has themes of death, injury, abandonment, guilt and despair. Play with care.

Tools of War is a hack of the Lost and Found system

Layout inspired by @stargazersasha's blood vessels
